name: Balloon Crazy
overview: Despite its name, Balloon Crazy is not a ripoff of Crazy Balloon, rather it's a knockoff of another arcade game called Kickman. This was developed by Joseph Russ and published as a type-in listing in the 85/12 issue of COMPUTE! magazine. A version for the Commodore 64 was also released that same year, a few months earlier in COMPUTE!'S Gazette.
